text: crevasse Well-Known Member Patreon Bronze Hey everyone! Long time no see. I'm excited to announce that my newest game, Letter Burp, is now available for pre-order on the App Store! It's a unique letter-stacking game where you create words by typing, rotating, and stacking letters—sounds simple, but the hazards will definitely keep you on your toes! There’s plenty of customizable content to unlock as you progress. If you’re into fun, quirky, and creative casual-word-stacking-ish games, be sure to check it out! App Store link: Pre-order Letter Burp Website (more info, press kit): https://letterburp.crevasse.co/ The game is available for free, with an IAP to unlock more levels and cosmetics. By pre-ordering and getting the game the day it launches, you'll get a 50% discount on the IAP. There are no ads, no data collecting. Thanks for your support, and I'd love to hear your thoughts! Happy Burrrping crevasse Well-Known Member Patreon Bronze Just finished adding and playtesting a new type of hazard. This level variation will force the player to use the right letter order when creating the words, here's a video with an example https://youtube.com/shorts/xI32xhXZl6w (sorry, it's automatically posted as Shorts by Youtube and can't embed it) Good luck on the upcoming game! It seems very interesting! crevasse Well-Known Member Patreon Bronze Update: The release date has been delayed. This will ensure I can deliver a highly polished experience. Also looking for testers. If you're interested, please send me a message. Thank you! An upcoming games section (for promotion, beta testing, feedback, etc.) has been recently added to TouchArcade's Discord channel. It'd be nice having you there as well, since it seems the forums are kinda destined to cease operations. Link to join Looks cool. Interesting about the 50% off unlock when preordering. Had no idea you could give discounts on IAPs for a preorder. Anyway, looking forward to trying it out! Share This Page

1. crevasse Well-Known Member
    Patreon Bronze

    Hey everyone! Long time no see.

    I'm excited to announce that my newest game, Letter Burp, is now available for pre-order on the App Store!

    It's a unique letter-stacking game where you create words by typing, rotating, and stacking letters—sounds simple, but the hazards will definitely keep you on your toes! There’s plenty of customizable content to unlock as you progress.

    If you’re into fun, quirky, and creative casual-word-stacking-ish games, be sure to check it out!

    App Store link: Pre-order Letter Burp
    Website (more info, press kit): https://letterburp.crevasse.co/

    The game is available for free, with an IAP to unlock more levels and cosmetics. By pre-ordering and getting the game the day it launches, you'll get a 50% discount on the IAP. There are no ads, no data collecting.

    Thanks for your support, and I'd love to hear your thoughts! Happy Burrrping
